reviewText: this workout was NOT as described on the site.  there was a video and it was a totally different workout than what was on the video...so disappointing.

I am a WAHM with five kids and because I live in a rural area there are no gyms in my area with child care available. So I rely on the ability to watch DVDs at home and work out in my living room. With some pilates DVDs I find the overdone instructions annoying -especially after the first viewing. I can watch a DVD more than once but I cannot unhear the babbling of instructions intended for a first-time viewer but played every time. I loved that Lisa cues the intermediate level verbally but has other people doing the exercises alongside her at the beginning and advanced levels as well. It was easy to glance at the appropriate person and increase or decrease the difficulty of a particular exercise according to my needs. The other thing that makes these DVDs stand out to me is that Lisa is a real woman, not a model. She is healthy, and personable, and so cute to watch! I feel like I'm working out with a friend, not being guilted by an unattainble 2% or photoshopped image. Both this DVD and the Body Physica Intense Four High Intensity Workouts - Lisa JohnsonDVD are great workouts that are relatable and viewable multiple times.
